Articles.Content:
I haven't moved off of 1.0.5 yet, and I recently found out that the small retractable landing gear have been...retextured...

I was wondering if a mod for 1.1.3 exists that adds them back into the game that is not Ven's Stock Revamp.

57 minutes ago, DaMachinator said:

I haven't moved off of 1.0.5 yet, and I recently found out that the small retractable landing gear have been...retextured...

I was wondering if a mod for 1.1.3 exists that adds them back into the game that is not Ven's Stock Revamp.

The small retractable gear from 1.0.5 is not just retextured it's a whole new model. The only way for them to be re added to 1.1.3 is if somebody re exported and completely rebuilt the parts hierarchy using the new wheel colliders and modules. As it stands a set of landing gear for 1.0.5 is totally incompatible with KSP version 1.1.3
That's what I'm asking for - is there a lookalike for 1.1.3 or am I going to have to wait for Adjustable Landing Gear which in turn means waiting for 1.2.x?
The effort would be put to better use making the Adjustable Landing Gear mod work.

22 hours ago, DaMachinator said:

That's what I'm asking for - is there a lookalike for 1.1.3 or am I going to have to wait for Adjustable Landing Gear which in turn means waiting for 1.2.x?

Baha is taking a break, so any new ALG is going to be our own work ( we don't have model source, so we might as well start over ).
